entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 60%
